subject: World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: As the Rangers took a 3-2 series lead, Adrian Beltre has led them with eight hits, a .381 average, 13 total bases and four runs scored heading into Game 6 in St. Louis.
snippet: As the Rangers took a 3-2 series lead, Adrian Beltre has led them with eight hits, a .381 average, 13 total bases and four runs scored heading into Game 6 in St. Louis.
